agilermi.utility.io

Interface RemoteOutput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, Remote

    public interface RemoteOutput
extends java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, Remote
    Represents a remote version of an OutputStream
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

    • Method Summary

      static java.io.OutputStream wrap(java.io.OutputStream output)
      Returns a serializable wrapper that holds a remote reference to the given OutputStream.

      • wrap

        static java.io.OutputStream wrap(java.io.OutputStream output)
        Returns a serializable wrapper that holds a remote reference to the given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        output - the OutputStream to wrap
        Returns:
        a remotely sharable version of the given OutputStream
